insert *pa�ern by @chibiscra� - use hashtag #chibiscra�pa�ern please do not hesitate to contact me if you are confused by any instruc- �ons h�ps //www instagram com/chibiscra� h�ps //www ravelry com/designers/febby-pranajaya abbreviations - r = row/round materials and tools - magic_ring = magic_ring - 2 0 mm hook or size suitable for yarn used - st = s�tch/s�tches - tapestry needle - single_crochet = single_crochet - 2 safety eyes size 4 mm - increase = single_crochet increase 2 single_crochet in the same st - fiberfill for stuffing - decrease = single_crochet decrease crochet 2 st together - yarn in the same size i used 4 ply co�on blend tips use invisible decrease for be�er finish yarn for the following colors red black dark - inc3 = 3 single_crochet in the same st brown white pink - dec3 = crochet 3 st together - half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet - half_double_crochet increase = half_double_crochet increase - chain = chain dimension - slip_stitch = slip s�tch using the same materials as me the finished doll - blo = back loops only is about 2 5 tall - flo = front loops only - ____ = repeat sequence between the square brackets for the indicated number of �mes - __ = s�tch count at the end of the row/round 2 head to abdomen antennas start with dark brown yarn to make the antennas start with red yarn to make the head on the upper side of the head r1 4sc in magic_ring 4 between r2-3 make a loop see picture then r2 inc3 x4 12 make 5ch 1sc at second chain from hook 1ss hide r3 single_crochet inc3 2sc inc3 x3 single_crochet 20 and secure the tails make 2 antennas side by r4 2sc inc3 4sc inc3 x3 2sc 28 side r5 blo 28sc 28 r6-11 6 rounds 28 single_crochet 28 a�er working r11 place the safety eyes between r9-10 at the front side the opposite side of the s�tch marker 4 st apart then embroider - the white of the eyes with white yarn - eyebrow at r7 with black yarn - blushing with pink yarn between r10-11 see picture arms start with dark brown yarn to make the arms we r7 will make 4 arms at the le� and right side of the r9 body 2 arms are located at the thorax between r10 r11 r16-17 the other 2 are located at the abdomen between r21-22 see pictures r12 blo 2sc dec3 4sc dec3 x3 2sc 20 r13 single_crochet dec3 2sc
